tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FarmActivity (
  ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  Date DATE,
  ActivityDescription TEXT,
  DroneID INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_DroneID FOREIGN KEY (DroneID) REFERENCES Drones(ID)
);

CREATE TABLE drone_imagery ( 
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    drone_id INT, 
    image_path VARCHAR(100), 
    capture_date TIMESTAMP, 
    image_description TEXT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES farm_activities(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE drones (
    drone_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    flight_range DECIMAL,
    max_speed DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE farm_fields (
    field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(50),
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    field_area DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE drone_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    image_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    image_data BYTEA,
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_id) REFERENCES drones(drone_id)
)

CREATE TABLE farm_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50),
    activity_date DATE,
    drone_image_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES farm_fields(field_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (drone_image_id) REFERENCES drone_images(image_id)
)

CREATE TABLE images (
  image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  image_date DATE,
  drone_id INT,
  farm_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY(drone_id) REFERENCES drones(drone_id),
  FOREIGN KEY(farm_id) REFERENCES farms(farm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE monitoring_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  farm_id INT,
  report_text TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY(farm_id) REFERENCES farms(farm_id)
);

CREATE TABLE activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(50),
  activity_date DATE,
  farm_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY(farm_id) REFERENCES farms(farm_id)
);
